Gap Description: No documented CI/CD pipelines for zipBoard (e.g., GitHub Actions, GitLab CI) to automatically trigger review cycles on code changes.
Suggested Title: CI/CD Integration Guide for Automated Review Triggers

Gap Description: Lack of detailed WCAG 2.1 compliance checklist and audit instructions for reviewing accessibility of annotated digital assets.
Insufficient coverage of ad‑blocker and extension troubleshooting steps (e.g., why annotations may not appear, how to enable in restricted environments).
Missing guidance on SSO configuration, SAML metadata, IP whitelisting, and granular permission policies for enterprise deployments.
Incomplete examples and reference architectures for using zipBoard webhooks and REST API to build custom automation workflows and integrate with third‑party tools.
Suggested Title: Building Custom Automation with zipBoard Webhooks & API
